title: Two women shot during struggle for gun at Downtown bar
content:
SAN ANTONIO — UPDATE: Police have made an arrest.
Selena Jade Martinez, 21, is charged with aggravated assault.
Two women are recovering after they were shot inside a Downtown bar.
The shooting happened Saturday morning at The Saint Bar on the 800 block of Lexington.
Police said she was at the club on Saturday when she started fighting with another woman. They say Martinez pulled out a gun and pistol whipped that other woman.
The gun went off during that attack and another person in the club was shot.
Both women are expected to be all right.
